# Purpose
This site is designed to provide quick updates on  water temperatures 
from [NOAA's GLERL website](https://www.glerl.noaa.gov/res/glcfs/ncast.php?lake=ont) for specific areas of Lake Ontario. Please click either Nowcast to see current projections for the past 12 hours and Forecast to next 72 hours. 

Current conditions can also be obtained at the [Ajax ECCC bouy](https://weather.gc.ca/marine/weatherConditions-currentConditions_e.html?mapID=11&siteID=08203&stationID=45159) for the near the Port Credit array. 

Current conditions can also be obtained at the [Grimbsy ECCC bouy]( https://weather.gc.ca/marine/weatherConditions-currentConditions_e.html?mapID=11&siteID=08203&stationID=45139) for the Hamilton array. 

Current conditions can be obtained at the [Niagara on the lake ECCC Bouy](https://seagull.glos.org/data-console/299/parameter/5265) for the Niagra array.
